import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import LanguageSwitcher from './LanguageSwitcher'; export default function Navigation({ onRequestDemo }) { const { t } = useTranslation(); const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const navigation = [ { name: t('navbar.home'), href: '/' }, { name: t('navbar.features'), href: '#features' }, { name: t('navbar.industries'), href: '#industries' }, { name: t('navbar.pricing'), href: '#pricing' }, ]; return (
Auditric
{navigation.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))}
{t('navbar.login')}
{/* Mobile menu */}
{navigation.map((item) => ( {item.name} ))} {t('navbar.login')}
); }
